SDG_GOAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR:
Indicator 16.7.1: Proportions of positions (by age group, sex, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local), including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions.

This metadata is for sub-component (a) of the indicator, on legislatures.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 16: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 16.7: Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL:
Indicator 16.7.1: Proportions of positions (by age group, sex, persons with disabilities and population groups) in public institutions (national and local), including (a) the legislatures; (b) the public service; and (c) the judiciary, compared to national distributions.
